Property Value

string

DisplayName

Determines the text display on the chart panel. This is also listed in the UI as the "Label" which can be manually changed. The default behavior of this property includes the indicator Name along with its input and data series parameters. However, this behavior can be overridden if desired.

public virtual string DisplayName { get; }

Property Value

string

EntityTypeName

The friendly name of type

public virtual string EntityTypeName { get; }

Property Value

Environment

Environment where the unit is running

public IScriptEnvironment? Environment { get; }

Property Value

IScriptEnvironment

Id

Unique identifier which is stored/restored and remains the same across processes and sessions

public string Id { get; protected set; }

Property Value

string

Remarks

On each instance creation this id is assigned to new value, but then, after constructor chain is finished, it is reassigned by deserialization So, never use its value from constructor, it may change!

InstanceId

Unique identifier for current process. This id can be used only inside current process and should not be permanently stored

public long InstanceId { get; }

Property Value

long

Name

Determines the listed name of the script object.

public string Name { get; }
